GSD.description:
tpm: use try_get_ops() in tpm-space.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.188 by commit 5b1d2561a03e534064b51c50c774657833d3d2cf. For more details please see the references link.
